Free Web Consultation

Your Website
Made to FLY

My name is OOF, and from my web design studio in New York, I help content creators and website owners create better experiences for their audiences by enhancing and expanding upon current websites or building bespoke sites from the ground UP.

Services

If you already have a website you may need a Spacelift, which is a makeover and enhancement service for your website. If you do not have a website or want to completely redo your current website you can sign up for a custom Web App service which offers the best way to interact and service your digital audience.

SpaceLift

I will work on your website regardless of the web building software you use and make it more performant, user-friendly, beautiful and effective.

Learn More

Web Apps

I will create a website with app capabilities from scratch using the 5D Web Creation Process and provide fine-tuned hosting.

Learn More

Content Marketing and SEO

I will help you craft content and create content marketing strategies for your brand that utilize the voice, subject matter and structure to appropriately engage with your audience and convert visitors into customers or subscribers.

Process

1. Detail

2. Design

3. Develop

4. Deploy

5. Dedicate

Learn more about our 5D Web Creation Process here.

I created the 5D Web Creation Process to provide unique and poignant websites and web apps to clients in a timely and professional manner.

  • Establish a project brief through an in-depth, 1-on-1 session
  • Assess what content we have to work with, and what content will be needed to launch the site
  • Utilize information to create the most appropriate design and infrastructure for your platform
  • Determine the timeline of the project
  • Create a home page that is a mix of your style preferences and my decisions on the structural necessities for your website or app
  • Confirm the home page with you so I can use the resulting design system to create subsequent pages
  • Review asynchronously throughout this phase and come together at key points
  • Utilize the green-lit designs to hand code the website in a way that is adaptable to any screen, accessible, featherweight and performant
  • Provide you the ability to test the website or web app for interactivity and responsiveness
  • Connect your website or web app files up to my hosting platform
  • Connect your domain name as well as any other external integrations your platform may need
  • Make it live for the world to see!
  • Provide you with feathermode's year-round site maintenance and security as well as privacy-friendly analytics
  • Host and dedicate my services to websites and web apps that preserve your privacy and data
  • Host your site on a platform with a global reach so you can connect with your audience no matter where they live in the world

Process

I created the 5D Web Creation Process to provide unique and poignant websites and web apps to clients in a timely and professional manner.

1. Detail

  • Establish a project brief through an in-depth, 1-on-1 session
  • Assess what content we have to work with, and what content will be needed to launch the site
  • Utilize information to create the most appropriate design and infrastructure for your platform
  • Determine the timeline of the project

2. Design

  • Create a home page that is a mix of your style preferences and my decisions on the structural necessities for your website or app
  • Confirm the home page with you so I can use the resulting design system to create subsequent pages
  • Review asynchronously throughout this phase and come together at key points

3. Develop

  • Utilize the green-lit designs to hand code the website in a way that is adaptable to any screen, accessible, featherweight and performant
  • Provide you the ability to test the website or web app for interactivity and responsiveness

4. Deploy

  • Connect your website or web app files up to my hosting platform
  • Connect your domain name as well as any other external integrations your platform may need
  • Make it live for the world to see!

5. Dedicate

  • Provide you with feathermode's year-round site maintenance and security as well as privacy-friendly analytics
  • Host and dedicate my services to websites and web apps that preserve your privacy and data
  • Host your site on a platform with a global reach so you can connect with your audience no matter where they live in the world
